name: Master's Tribute
description:
As a difficult person to buy gifts for I have created this. It's a more novel way to determine how much money to gift someone, the recipient can play the game, and the gift giver watch and gift the money afterwards.

Game explanation:

Roll die, once you are over the threshold then the game is over. The threshold increases with each roll by a percentage of the current threshold, the starting threshold and increasing percentage can be configured before playing.

Any dice that are not facing upward at the end of the roll are considered a 0 value, otherwise their value is the number on the die.

Note: A negative threshold can be used to have a lowering value each time too.
